title: Mentorship: ACSES Mock Interviews
name: ACSES Mock Interviews
body:
With the ACSES Mentor Board 2018 members, I organized mock interviews for the Assistant Board 2018 members to have early exposure to the facts that industries expect. Mock interviews helped them prepare for the actual interviews, to make them aware of their lagging indicators to improve upon them.
My friends, Omkar Jadhav and Anand Pisal interviewing my juniors inside the cabin at the Training and Placement Centre, Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli.
